olcme_degerlendirme: Measurement and evaluation methods should be planned by considering the level of the learning outcome and the content of the topic. To ensure a holistic evaluation of the student, both traditional and complementary (alternative) measurement and evaluation methods should be used together, in accordance with the learning outcome and the topic content.In measurement and evaluation practices, assessment should not be limited to outcome-oriented evaluation only; measurement activities aimed at process evaluation should also be planned. The evaluations planned throughout the process are important for identifying and addressing possible deficiencies in teaching and learning.For students who continue their education through inclusion/integration, the Individualized Education Program (IEP) is taken as the basis in measurement and evaluation.

To ensure a holistic evaluation of the student, both traditional and complementary (alternative) measurement and evaluation methods should be used together, in accordance with the learning outcome and the topic content.In measurement and evaluation practices, assessment should not be limited to outcome-oriented evaluation only; measurement activities aimed at process evaluation should also be planned. The evaluations planned throughout the process are important for identifying and addressing possible deficiencies in teaching and learning.For students who continue their education through inclusion/integration, the Individualized Education Program (IEP) is taken as the basis in measurement and evaluation.
